item.title: KCC Oci and Cosign
item.description: Signing OCI KCC Artifacts Using Cosign I’ve been meaning to try out cosign to sign OCI artifacts for a while now and recently had a chance to give it a whirl and well it’s pretty awesome.

item.title: Fun with Config Controller and GitOps
item.description: For some fun I decided to put together a little example tutorial on some of the things I’ve been playing around with, namely Kubernetes Config Connector and Config Controller.
